name: cypress-cucumber-automation
description: Cypress-Cucumber-TypeScript Automation Framework with Cucumber Test Report or Allure Report

scripts.cypress:chrome:headless: cypress run --e2e --browser chrome --headless || true && npm run
scripts.cypress:run:cucumber: npm run cucumber:clear && cypress run --browser chrome --spec "cypress/e2e/features/*" --headed || true && npm run cucumber:report
scripts.cypress:run:dev: npm run cucumber:clear && cypress run --env configFile=dev --spec "cypress/e2e/features/*" --headed && npm run cucumber:report
scripts.cypress:run-tags: npm run cucumber:clear && cypress run --env tags='@smoke' --spec "cypress/e2e/features/*" --headed || true && node cucumber-html-report.ts && open reports/html/index.html
scripts.cucumber:clear: rimraf log npm_install_debug.log reports cucumber-report.html  cypress/videos cypress/screenshots || true
scripts.mochawesome:clear: rimraf cypress/mochawesomeReport cypress/reports cypress/videos cypress-mochawesome-reporter.log || true
scripts.allure:clear: rimraf allure-results/ allure-report cypress/screenshots cypress/videos reports || true
scripts.cypress:run-allure:headless: cypress run --env allure=true --spec "cypress/e2e/features/*" --browser=chrome || true && npm run allure:report && allure open
scripts.allure:history: mv -f allure-report/history allure-results/history && rimraf allure-report || true
scripts.allure:full: npm run allure:clear && npm run cypress:run-allure || true && npm run allure:report && allure open

author: Junhao Hu
